segments.text: I heard that you went to the concert the day before ? How did you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was terrific.The concert was really a hit.The symphony orchestra was so good that I was completely absorbed in their performance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , speaking of the conductor , he is indeed a genius.He did a perfect job.His name is Menuhin , a descendent of Russian American immigrants .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I learned that he is also a legendary violinist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely right.He gave a performance of Felix Mendelssohn's violin concerto.That caused a sensation.The audience were stunned by his pure tone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Obviously you did enjoy the concert .
segments.speaker: S1
